node.name: Expedition Camping tent(6 Person) MAKE: PRAKAL
node.description: The premium quality expedition tent with capacity to in house the team of 6 members under above average rough conditions like snow. Water resistant polyester fabric and fiberglass material frames makes the tent stiff enough to take heavy wind, rain and snowfall. (SIZE: 1800x1800x900mm / WEIGHT: 2.1 Kg)
node.content: Selection of material for every component of this tent is done by expert mountaineers / Factors like cold & heat through ground is also overcome through insulation sheet of polyethylene / Fiberglass frames which are skeleton of the tent can hold the weight of snow and pressure of heavy rain and this premium quality frames are lightweight so that carry easily / Some special features are also cater in design like ventilation & mosquitoes mesh / These ventilation mesh also helps to bypass the heavy wind from top at time of countering extreme condition / All setup is compacted under one bag packaging with two side carry system of bag / This tent is suitable for altitude hiking, small expedition, snow camping and family picnic.
node.alt: Prakal Tents for Camping 6 Person,Instant Pop Up Tents for Camping, Beach Tents for Family,Folding Waterproof Tent for Outdoor Camping

node.name: Base Camping tent(3 +1 Person) MAKE: COLEMAN
node.description: Base camp tent for climbers which has space for (3+1) persons, 100% waterproof with anti-grip property of tent material towards snow. Medium large flysheet is extra space for cooking and placing baggage. (SIZE: 3300x1800x1200mm / WEIGHT: 2.5 Kg)
node.content: An American brand that is known for the best outdoor recreation products, came up with this base camp tent that can lay (3+1) persons i.e. 3 off grid climbers or expeditioners and 1 person to stay at base camp as supporting staff / Tent materials are subjected for numerous test under guidelines of experience & veteran climbers / Upper layer of tent has anti-grip property which skid the snow due to its own weight / Flysheet(fabric cover pitched outside and over a tent to give extra protection) covers the enough space for cooking under small flames of fire / Dimension: 3300mm x 1800mm x 1200mm (Main Tent) and 500mm x 190mm x 190mm (Flysheet) / Net weight of entire tent equipment is under 5Kg which is as per standard norms of professional climbers.
node.alt: Coleman Darwin 3 Plus Dome Tent, 3 Man Camping Tent with Fibreglass Poles, 3000 mm Water Column, Waterproof

node.name: Trekking Camping tent(3 Person) MAKE: QUECHUA
node.description: An international product, with 2 years warranty, for regular and professional trekkers that is built to stand against any weather condition. With space for 3 persons & material tested in real time adverse conditions of tallest mountains of world. (SIZE: 1800x1000x900mm / WEIGHT: 1.5 Kg)
node.content: Team of French mountaineers & material technicians came up with this tent design, while simplicity is the first principle to cut short the lifting weight for regular campers and professional trekkers / Only basic improvements are implemented like flysheet(fabric cover pitched outside and over a tent to give extra protection) and ventilation at back / Dome shape helps to control overall weight of entire tent equipment under 1/5 Kg which is good for professionals to carry extra weight of food & other means / Besides of being imported product its cost is under reasonable range for individuals who loves long term investment, 2 years warranty is also provided / To reduce the environmental impact, maker decided to dye every other thread of rope and also they assembled the entire tent in one hook bag.

strapiProduct.description: An international product, with 2 years warranty, for regular and professional trekkers that is built to stand against any weather condition. With space for 3 persons & material tested in real time adverse conditions of tallest mountains of world. (SIZE: 1800x1000x900mm / WEIGHT: 1.5 Kg)
